forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 18C. S winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High near 65F. S winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain showers. Low around 15C. Winds SSE at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain showers. Low 59F. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain, heavy at times. High 16C. S winds at 40 to 65 km/h, decreasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 50 to 75mm of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain, heavy at times. High 62F. S winds at 25 to 40 mph, decreasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 56F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 14C. SSE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 59F. SSE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 15C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 60F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 50F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
